title: Glamour Magazine Redesign
content:
For my project, I need to redesign Glamour magazine. I first need to start with a new logo. Any suggestion for typefaces?

Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051719im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Glamour_Logo_4790.GIF)

 [‹ Avant Garde 101](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051719/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49638 "Go to previous forum topic") [Memphis: Identity Workhorse? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051719/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49660 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jackieki

comments.content: Many magazine logos are drawn by hand for distinction and optimum letterfit. This isn’t far from [ITC Franklin Gothic Heavy Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025051719/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/itc_franklin_gothic_std_complete_vp/?sample_text=GLAMOUR&sample_size=48). Slightly narrower.
Hard to start suggesting when we don’t have the brief, history and why the need to change the logo.
Oh whoops, I took this as a ID request. KC is right. Need more info to offer suggestions. I did always think FG was an odd manly choice for the mag.
